text: Terence Hill (born Mario Girotti; 29 March 1939) is an Italian actor. He was known for his roles in Lo chiamavano Trinità (They Call Me Trinity, 1971) and Il mio nome è Nessuno (My Name Is Nobody, 1973), co-starring Henry Fonda. His movie Django, Prepare a Coffin, shot in 1968 by director Ferdinando Baldi, and co-starring Horst Frank and George Eastman, was featured at the 64th Venice Film Festival in 2007. He was also known for making many movies with actor Bud Spencer. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:People from Venice
title: Terence Hill
